version_description:
- Easily add favorites to Quick Access
- Cleaner visual design
- Hide/show the toolbar on iPhone by swiping up at the bottom of a webpage
- Bug fixes and improvements

- Enhancements for iPhone XS & XR
- Bug fixes

- Enhanced for the new iPhone XS
Perfect Browser is now free with an optional in-app upgrade. All the existing users will not notice anything different in this release.

- Enhanced for the new iPhone XS
Perfect Browser is now free with an optional in-app upgrade. Existing users will not notice anything different in this release.
- Bug fixes
- Minor enhancements

- Crispy! Sharper icons on iPhone. Optimizations & bug fixes
v22: Enhanced for iPhone XS
- Perfect Browser is now free with an optional in-app upgrade. Existing users will not notice anything different in this release

- Some improvements
v22: Enhanced for iPhone XS
- Crispy! Sharper icons
- Perfect Browser is now free with an optional in-app upgrade. Existing users will not notice anything different in this release
- General improvements and bug fixes
- Enhanced for new devices

- Toolbar automatically disappears as you scroll
- Long press show toolbar / exit fullscreen button for Quick Access
- Bug fixes and improvements

- Adjustable toolbar height & option to auto hide
- Bug fix
Enhanced for new devices

- Minor enhancements
- Duplicate tab without content blockers
New theme
UI enhancements
Minor enhancements

Private Tabs. Long press add tab to open
Tracking Protection & Custom AdBlock filters (multiple-entry)
Toggle search suggestions quickly. On iPhone, Long press Clear Search in the list
Minor enhancements

The wait is over. Perfect v24 is here!
- NEON/DARK Mode - Every theme has a DARK variant
- New Interface & Icons with color choices
- New landscape layout and Auto-hiding toolbar on iPhone. Tap the bottom to show the toolbar
- Multiple Custom Filters (in AdBlock format or Regular) and Whitelist Exclusions
- 'Open in Private Tab' added to long-press menu
- Option for 'Classic Icons'
- 'Copy text content' option added to Files
- Other improvements and fixes
- Bug fixes and improvements

- iOS Share extension
- Search from url field
- Minor improvements
